data.enText: to work very hard and/or for a long time, usually doing hard physical work
to move slowly and with difficulty

data.chText: 他们冒着炎炎烈日艰难地一步一步爬上山冈。
data.enText: They toiled up the hill in the blazing sun.
hard unpleasant work that makes you very tired
a life of hardship and toil

ex.chText: 我们的工作多得做不完。
ex.enText: We have more work than we can deal with.
He started work when he was just 15.

ex.chText: 只有热爱工作的人才能享受到工作中的乐趣。
ex.enText: Only those who love their work can enjoy the delight in work.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，含义广泛，既可指体力劳动也可指脑力劳动，通常都以挣钱为目的，有时也指机器干的工作。

ex.enText: Peter does odd jobs for his neighbours.

ex.chText: 整理这些报告是件很辛苦的事。
ex.enText: Sorting these reports out is going to be a hard job.

ex.chText: 她女儿在银行里有份工作。
ex.enText: Her daughter has a job in a bank.

ex.chText: 这项工作要付出很多艰苦的劳动。
ex.enText: The job requires much hard labour.

synonyms.bx: 多用于口语，侧重指受雇用的、以谋生为目的的工作。

ex.chText: 一切财富归根到底来源于人类的劳动。
ex.enText: All wealth comes ultimately from human labour.
There is a clear division of labour in ants.

ex.chText: 他以他辛苦的劳动换取食物和栖身之所。
ex.enText: In return for his labour, he receives food and shelter.

ex.chText: 劳苦的一生通常是声望和成功的代价。
ex.enText: A life of toil is generally the price of fame and success.

ex.chText: 我无可奉献，除了鲜血、辛劳、泪水和汗水。
ex.enText: I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.

tr: productive work (especially physical work done for wages)
example: his labor did not require a great deal of skill
She was digging away at her math homework

value.def: When people toil, they work very hard doing unpleasant or tiring tasks.

example.ex: People who toiled in dim, dank factories were too exhausted to enjoy their family life...
example.tran: 在昏暗潮湿的工厂辛苦劳作的人们累得无力再去享受家庭生活。
工人们长时间辛苦劳动。

example.ex: She has toiled away at the violin for years...
Nora toils away serving burgers at the local cafe.
example.tran: 诺拉在当地小餐馆干着一份为客人端送汉堡包的辛苦活儿。

value.def: If you toil somewhere, you move there slowly and with difficulty, usually because you are very tired.

example.ex: Arnold had his head down, gasping as he toiled up the hill.
example.tran: 阿诺德垂着头，一边费劲地往山上爬一边气喘吁吁。

value.tran: (通常指因疲倦而)费劲地行走，艰难地行动

value.def: Toil is unpleasant work that is very tiring physically.
